description.ko: 압도적인 수압을 견디고 해저 깊은 곳의 숨겨진 미스테리를 밝히기 위해 설계된 최첨단 심해 탐사 유닛입니다.
description.en: A state-of-the-art deep-sea exploration unit engineered to withstand crushing pressures and illuminate the darkest mysteries of the ocean floor.

prompt: Cinematic high-detail shot of a futuristic submersible robot named AQUA-5 with glowing cyan bioluminescent lights, navigating through a dark underwater canyon in the deep ocean, surrounded by giant tube worms and volcanic thermal vents, 8k resolution, volumetric lighting, photorealistic, intricate mechanical plating, deep navy and chrome finish.
